entry.title: THE SIKH EMPIRE FIGHTS FOR INDIA | Victoria 3 - Sikh Empire Ep.01 Let's Play Mini-Series

media:group.media:title: THE SIKH EMPIRE FIGHTS FOR INDIA | Victoria 3 - Sikh Empire Ep.01 Let's Play Mini-Series
media:group.media:description:
The Sikh Empire is a challenging start in Victoria 3, surrounded by enemies, with a faltering economy, and a political leaning that one might call "somewhat traditionalist". While some of our wounds are self-inflicted, and many of our enemies are admittedly weak, the one to our East has a terrifying overlord, and the strength to crush us in one fell swoop. In this Victoria 3 let's play, we will take charge as the Sikh Empire, pushing the East India Company out of the Indian Subcontinent, and then creating the Empire under the Pun through the subjugation of Great Britain.
Watch the Beginner's Guide Playlist here - https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLwVftHdWAdHNG8h8kx80LjaXBcLGV25HL
Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/_PartyElite Become a member: https://www.youtube.com/c/PartyElite/join Support me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/PartyElite Send me a Tip: https://streamlabs.com/partyelite Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/6Tq3ut5
#Victoria3

entry.title: VICTORIA 3 | BECOME A COLONIAL SUPERPOWER - How To Colonize (Beginner's Guide & Tutorial)

media:group.media:title: VICTORIA 3 | BECOME A COLONIAL SUPERPOWER - How To Colonize (Beginner's Guide & Tutorial)
media:group.media:description:
In this beginner's guide video for Victoria 3 we're going to take a look at the process of colonization, and everything you need to do in order to colonize parts of the world. This includes tech, institutions, and the process of peaceful as well as violent annexation of your new states, and a discussion on how to pick where to colonize, and how to take advantage of your colonized provinces before you've incorporated the state.
Watch the Beginner's Guide Playlist here - https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLwVftHdWAdHNG8h8kx80LjaXBcLGV25HL
Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/_PartyElite Become a member: https://www.youtube.com/c/PartyElite/join Support me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/PartyElite Send me a Tip: https://streamlabs.com/partyelite Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/6Tq3ut5
#Victoria3

entry.title: VICTORIA 3 | MAJOR MISTAKES TO AVOID - Beginner's Guide & Tips (Gameplay Tutorial)

media:group.media:title: VICTORIA 3 | MAJOR MISTAKES TO AVOID - Beginner's Guide & Tips (Gameplay Tutorial)
media:group.media:description:
In this beginner's guide video for Victoria 3 we're going to take a look at some easy-to-make mistakes that might be causing you some trouble, or otherwise slowing you down as you play. While these are mostly broad strokes and some should be taken with a grain of salt, these quick tips should help you get a better understanding of how things work opposite to how you might expect sometimes in Victoria 3, and I hope they point out commonly forgotten aspects of the game too.
Watch the Beginner's Guide Playlist here - https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLwVftHdWAdHNG8h8kx80LjaXBcLGV25HL
Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/_PartyElite Become a member: https://www.youtube.com/c/PartyElite/join Support me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/PartyElite Send me a Tip: https://streamlabs.com/partyelite Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/6Tq3ut5
00:00 - Intro 00:31 - Producing Staples 01:47 - Paying for Construction 02:34 - Stagnating Tax Policies 03:52 - Swaying First 04:30 - Abandoning Markets 05:23 - Rushing Production Methods 06:04 - Ignoring Economy of Scale 07:04 - Ignoring Lenses & Decrees 09:40 - Rushing the Wrong Tech 10:44 - Ignoring your Navy 12:22 - Outro
#Victoria3

entry.title: VICTORIA 3 | BIG TIPS TO MAKE BIG MONEY - Beginner's Guide & Tips

media:group.media:title: VICTORIA 3 | BIG TIPS TO MAKE BIG MONEY - Beginner's Guide & Tips
media:group.media:description:
In this beginner's guide video for Victoria 3 we're going to take a look at how the economy works in the game, specifically as it pertains to the national economy and maximizing profits. The tutorial should help you come to grips with the various fiscal policies and concepts in the game, and you'll learn how to work with various kinds of taxes, and the best ways to make money in Victoria 3.
Watch the Beginner's Guide Playlist here - https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLwVftHdWAdHNG8h8kx80LjaXBcLGV25HL
Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/_PartyElite Become a member: https://www.youtube.com/c/PartyElite/join Support me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/PartyElite Send me a Tip: https://streamlabs.com/partyelite Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/6Tq3ut5
00:00 - Intro 00:29 - Treasury, Budget, Loans & Bankruptcy 04:49 - Taking Tributes 08:17 - Finetune Taxes & Tariffs 16:00 - Invest in Investment Pools 17:53 - Cutting Costs & Minting Money 21:58 - Outro
#Victoria3

entry.title: VICTORIA 3 | WARS & DIPLOMATIC PLAYS EXPLAINED (Beginner's Guide & How to Play)

media:group.media:title: VICTORIA 3 | WARS & DIPLOMATIC PLAYS EXPLAINED (Beginner's Guide & How to Play)
media:group.media:description:
In this beginner's guide video for Victoria 3 we're going to take a look at how war and diplomatic plays work in the game. The tutorial should help you come to grips with which diplomatic plays do what, how naval invasions and actions can be used to your advantage, the economics of war, and the how battles and fronts actually work. This beginner's guide series will cover a variety of topics over multiple episodes, diving deep into core concepts of Victoria 3 - despite it being possible to play through a game without declaring war, how war works is definitely worth understanding and exploring.
Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/_PartyElite Become a member: https://www.youtube.com/c/PartyElite/join Support me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/PartyElite Send me a Tip: https://streamlabs.com/partyelite Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/6Tq3ut5
00:00 - Intro 00:40 - Diplomatic Plays Explained 08:35 - The Phases & Escalation to War 15:14 - Fielding, Equipping & Affording an Army 19:46 - Fronts, Battles & Naval Support 31:08 - The Aftermath of War 33:03 - Outro
#Victoria3

entry.title: VICTORIA 3 | Beginner's Guide - 7 Essentials Before You Start (New Player Tutorial)

media:group.media:title: VICTORIA 3 | Beginner's Guide - 7 Essentials Before You Start (New Player Tutorial)
media:group.media:description:
This video is sponsored by Paradox Interactive. Grab the game and take on the world here - https://play.victoria3game.com/PartyElite
Victoria 3 has finally released, and as expected, it's dense with a variety of complex mechanics that tackle everything from economics to politics to social progress. In today's beginner's guide video, we're going to take a look at the basics of how to play Victoria 3, understanding how pops work, how trade works, how diplomacy works, and more. This is just the start of the beginner's guide series - with so many topics to explore, we'll be doing a deep dive on everything from war to interest groups and more besides.
Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/_PartyElite Become a member: https://www.youtube.com/c/PartyElite/join Support me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/PartyElite Send me a Tip: https://streamlabs.com/partyelite Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/6Tq3ut5
00:00 - Intro 00:35 - You're Working Against Yourself - A Preamble 02:35 - Understanding Pops 06:06 - Interest Groups & Changing Laws 12:01 - The Impacts of Wealth & Standard of Living 16:03 - Buildings, Production & Profitability 22:19 - Understand Markets & Trade 31:14 - Interests, Diplomacy & Escalation 34:10 - Outro
#Victoria3 #ad

entry.title: THE VALIANT - NEW MEDIEVAL RTS with Squad-Based Tactics (2022 New Strategy Games)

media:group.media:title: THE VALIANT - NEW MEDIEVAL RTS with Squad-Based Tactics (2022 New Strategy Games)
media:group.media:description:
This video is sponsored by THQ Nordic. Learn more about The Valiant and grab it for yourself here - https://store.steampowered.com/app/959860/The_Valiant/
The Valiant brings squad-based real-time strategy and tactics to Medieval Europe, blending with light RPG elements. The story takes you across Europe and the Middle East as a former Crusader seeking out a relic which, in the wrong hands, would prove dangerous for humanity. Using your tactical prowess and a handful of unit types - each with their own flavour and style - fight through marauders, Saracens, and former friends alike.
Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/_PartyElite Become a member: https://www.youtube.com/c/PartyElite/join Support me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/PartyElite Send me a Tip: https://streamlabs.com/partyelite Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/6Tq3ut5
00:00 - Intro 00:39 - The Story at Hand 03:16 - Roleplaying Real-Time Strategy 07:01 - Multiple Multiplayer Modes 10:06 - Unit Variety & Depth 13:50 - Hero Characters & Elite Squads 15:44 - Tactical Prowess 17:52 - Outro
#TheValiant #ad

entry.title: STARDEUS - 4 ESSENTIAL TIPS BEFORE YOU BEGIN (NEW Sci-fi Colony Management)

media:group.media:title: STARDEUS - 4 ESSENTIAL TIPS BEFORE YOU BEGIN (NEW Sci-fi Colony Management)
media:group.media:description:
This video is sponsored by Paradox Arc. Grab Stardeus here and build your spacebound colony - https://rebrand.ly/PartyElite-Stardeus
Stardeus is a sci-fi colony management game where you travel through the universe on board a ship, dealing with the uncertainty of space travel, managing drones and living beings and their needs and wants alike. From a precariously balanced energy grid to a complex tech tree, and from a massive starmap to explore to the layout and habitability of your ship, there's a lot to manage at any given time.
00:00 - Intro 00:47 - Prepare for Awakening 04:49 - Advancing & Using Skills 07:05 - Trading & Spacefaring 10:11 - The Secrets of Science 12:29 - Outro
#Stardeus #ad

entry.title: TWO POINT CAMPUS | EP. 29 - AT WITCH COST? (Campaign Let's Play)

media:group.media:title: TWO POINT CAMPUS | EP. 29 - AT WITCH COST? (Campaign Let's Play)
media:group.media:description:
Two Point Campus is here, and we're taking on the role of Campus Administrator across multiple universities at Two Point County as we try to educate the masses in the ways of PARTY. This management / tycoon style game has an excellent balance of comedy and challenge, and harkens back to classics from my earliest days of playing in the genre.
Buy it here to support the channel as you buy: https://partyelite.gg/game-store

#TwoPointCampus

entry.title: THE CAPTAIN'S FOLLY | Karl Franz Immortal Empires Campaign | Total War: Warhammer 3

media:group.media:title: THE CAPTAIN'S FOLLY | Karl Franz Immortal Empires Campaign | Total War: Warhammer 3
media:group.media:description:
Karl Franz must unite The Empire in Total War: Warhammer 3 if he's to have any hope against the darkness that encroaches in Immortal Empires. Our new Let's Play will take us to one of the oldest playable factions over the last 6 years of Total War: Warhammer games - The Empire. New gameplay mechanics from The Empire rework means we'll be tackling the Elector Counts, Machinations, and more as we expand across the Old World and more.
Buy the game and its DLC here to support the channel as you buy: https://partyelite.gg/game-store
Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/_PartyElite Become a member: https://www.youtube.com/c/PartyElite/join Support me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/PartyElite Send me a Tip: https://streamlabs.com/partyelite Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/6Tq3ut5
#ImmortalEmpires #TotalWarWarhammer3

entry.title: STEAM NEXT FEST 2022 | 5 Great Games to Try - October 2022 (Strategy, 4X, Management, City Building)

media:group.media:title: STEAM NEXT FEST 2022 | 5 Great Games to Try - October 2022 (Strategy, 4X, Management, City Building)
media:group.media:description:
If you're wondering what games to play at the October Steam Next Fest in 2022, here's a set of five great games that are well worth your time. In this video we'll go through a handful of strategy games, city builders, tactical combat titles and more as we discuss some of the most interesting looking games at Next Fest. This video was made possible due to the developers providing me with early access to their titles and a heads up that they'd be participating in the October Next Fest, and you can expect a follow-up video after the festival is over highlighting more games that I wasn't able to check out beforehand!
Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/_PartyElite Become a member: https://www.youtube.com/c/PartyElite/join Support me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/PartyElite Send me a Tip: https://streamlabs.com/partyelite Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/6Tq3ut5
00:00 - Intro 00:38 - Manor Lords 03:43 - Inkulinati 06:00 - Alliance of the Sacred Suns 07:53 - Capital Command 09:17 - Against the Storm
#NextFest

entry.title: [VOD] - DISCO ELYSIUM | Livestream Let's Play Episode 15

media:group.media:title: [VOD] - DISCO ELYSIUM | Livestream Let's Play Episode 15
media:group.media:description:
Become a Member: https://www.youtube.com/c/PartyElite/join | Support the stream: https://streamelements.com/partyelite/tip | Discord: https://discord.gg/6Tq3ut5 | Twitter: https://twitter.com/_PartyElite
Despite being a huge fan of RPGs, I never had a chance to play Disco Elysium when it first came out. We're here to fix that! Note that, though the game originally released in 2019, we're checking out the updated version from 2021 - The Final Cut!
